Title: Everything Is Wonderful
Director: Vinton Heuck, Ciro Nieli, Frank Paur
Writer: Brandon Auman, Jack Kirby (comic book), Joe Simon (comic book)
Actors: Phil LaMarr, Rick D. Wasserman, Eric Loomis, Wally Wingert
Plot: Furious at Tony Stark for buying up his company, Simon Williams seeks revenge by undergoing a dangerous AIM procedure, overseen by MODOC and the Grim Reaper, Williams' brother, which turns him into a being of pure ion energy.
